title: Pump.fun Outpaces Major DEX in Revenue Despite Lower Volume
summary: A Solana-based memecoin launchpad is generating more revenue than established DEXs while processing only 10% of their trading volume, signaling a shift in fee models and early-stage token discovery. This development has created a high-stakes rivalry as platforms compete for dominance in retail crypto transactions.

title: Pump.fun Token Launches Drop Sharply After $TRUMP Launch
summary: Token launch activity on Pump.fun has experienced a significant decline following the $TRUMP token launch, as shown in accompanying data visualization. This trend suggests changing market dynamics and potential saturation in the memecoin launch space.

title: PUMP Token Public Sale Set for July 2025 at $4B Valuation
summary: Pump.fun will launch its PUMP token via a 72-hour public sale on July 12, 2025, offering 150B tokens (15% of 1T supply) at $0.004 each on Gate.com and its own platform. The $4B valuation compared to Raydium's $1.2B FDV presents either a significant arbitrage opportunity or overvaluation risk.
